channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Db2 Warehouse (dashdb) was made available in the Sao Paolo catalog
[updated] Security and Compliance Center Workload Protection (sysdig-secure) has changed the description of the plan named graduated-tier
item.description:
*before*: Image scan results, compliance results, policy events, activity audit and forensic captures are accessible and retained for 90 days.
Cost is for each node hour. For example if you are running one agent for 24 hours a day and the month has 30 days, the estimated cost is approximately $55 USD.
*CSPM capabilities are currently free for a promotional period
Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans, *after*: Image scan results, compliance results, policy events, activity audit and forensic captures are accessible and retained for 90 days.
Cost is for each node hour. For example if you are running one agent for 24 hours a day and the month has 30 days, the estimated cost is approximately $45 USD.
*CSPM capabilities are currently free for a promotional period
Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans

item.title: [added] etiCloud secure digital agile workplace (eticloud-secure-digital-agile-workplace)
item.description: etiCloud Secure Digital Agile Workplace - Secure Desktop-as-a-Service delivered as a private business environment.
